bibl.title: Down-Stream to the Cat-Goddess: Herodotus on Egyptian Pilgrimage.
Pilgrimage in Graeco-Roman & Early Christian Antiquity. Seeing the Gods
bibl.author: RUTHERFORD, Ian

bibl.note: I. Herodotus on Egyptian Festivals. - II. Pilgrimage in Ancient Egypt. - III. The Pilgrimage to Boubastis. - IV. Pilgrims and Animal Mummies. - V. Who was Bastet? Syncretism and Sacred Geography.
RUTHERFORD Ian, Down-Stream to the Cat-Goddess: Herodotus on Egyptian Pilgrimage.
Jas ELSNER and Ian RUTHERFORD (Edd.), Pilgrimage in Graeco-Roman & Early Christian Antiquity. Seeing the Gods (Oxford, 2005) pp. 131-149.
